section.heading: Council hearing.
section.text: Three years from March 16, 2005, the Council committee having jurisdiction over the Department of Health shall hold a public hearing on the appropriateness of the requirements for anesthesiologist assistants imposed by the Act [D.C. Law 15-237].

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: The “Act”, referred to in text, refers to Law 15-237.
